Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SourceListener
public class GameHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements SourceListener
GameHandler manages a single match, notifying the controller about the actions that the clients want to do and receiving the change events of the model and the controller

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Controller controller
    It is the Controller of the current game
    private Source controllerListener  
    private Game model
    It is the model of the current game
    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ClientHandler> players
    This attribute is used to save the ClientHandler of each player for the current game based on their names
    private int playersNumber
    It is the number of players of the current game

      See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameHandler

      public GameHandler​(int playersNumber)
      Constructor of the GameHandler. Based on the value of the parameter, it instantiates a SoloGame or a MultiGame
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players for the current match

  • Method Details

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      playersNumber getter method
      Returns:
      the number of players of the current match

    • start

      public void start()
      This method is called by the Server when the number of players for the match has been reached. It starts the game

    • sendSingle

      public void sendSingle​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String client)
      Method used to send a socket message to a single client
      Parameters:
      message - the serialized message that is to be sent
      client - the name of the client that has to receive the message

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll​(java.lang.String message)
      Method used to send a socket message to all the players of the game
      Parameters:
      message - the serialized message that is to be sent

    • sendAllExcept

      public void sendAllExcept​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String client)
      Method used to send a socket message to all the players but one
      Parameters:
      message - the serialized message that is to be sent
      client - the client that must not receive the message

    • makeAction

      public void makeAction​(Message message, java.lang.String player)
      Method called by a ClientHandler when a client wants to do an action
      Parameters:
      message - the message sent by the client: it contains all the info needed to perform the action
      player - the name of the player that sent the message

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(java.lang.String name, ClientHandler client)
      Method used to add a player to the game
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      client - the ClientHandler of the player

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      Method used to remove a player when the game has not started yet
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player that disconnected from the game

    • manageDisconnection

      public void manageDisconnection​(java.lang.String name)
      Method used to remove a player when the game has started. It notifies all the other players that the game is going to end
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the disconnected player

    • getModel

      public Game getModel()
      Simple method to get the model of the current game
      Returns:
      the model (Game class) of the current game

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Synchronized method used to check if the game has already started
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.List<ClientHandler> getPlayers()
      players getter method
      Returns:
      the list of ClientHandler of the current game

    • update

      public void update​(java.lang.String propertyName, Message message)
      Specified by:
      update in interface SourceListener
